concept.title: Required Fields in Processors
concept.shortdesc: A required field must exist in a record to keep it in the pipeline. When a record does not include a required field, the processor discards the record. You can configure required fields for any processor or target stage.

conbody.p: Configure required fields to minimize processing errors or according to your business requirements.
For example, a Field Hasher encodes social security data in the /SS field. To ensure processing only records with social security values, make /SS a required field.
